name: Air Elemental
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

name: Balduvian Horde
oracle_text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

name: Ball Lightning
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

name: Blizzard Elemental
oracle_text: Flying
{3}{U}: Untap Blizzard Elemental.
flavor_text: Students who had seen Rayne argue with Urza were certain she had summoned it to make him seem warmer by comparison.

name: Bloodrock Cyclops
oracle_text: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"He's big an' dumb an' ready to fight. A lot like ol' Hornhead here."
—Squee, goblin cabin hand,
scouting report

name: Bone Harvest
oracle_text: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Only fools believe they will face my armies but once."
—Kaervek

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments victory was mine."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter
Kjeldoran royal mage

name: Clockwork Avian
oracle_text: Flying
Clockwork Avian enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.

{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Clockwork Beast
oracle_text: Clockwork Beast enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.

{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Cloud Djinn
oracle_text: Flying
Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
As elusive as the footprint of a djinn
—Suq'Ata expression

name: Cloud Elemental
oracle_text: Flying
Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"You know you've angered the gods when the clouds turn against you."
—Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

name: Coercion
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail."
—Volrath

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Crash of Rhinos
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
Love is like a rhino, short-sighted and hasty; if it cannot find a way, it will make a way.
—Femeref adage

name: Crashing Boars
oracle_text: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature they control. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.
flavor_text: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.

name: Deadly Insect
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: With his newfound sense of self-importance, Squee set his sights on ever-bigger bugs.

name: Death Stroke
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home, As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse—the curse had been fulfilled.

name: Diabolic Edict
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Greven il-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

name: Diabolic Vision
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"I have seen the true path. I will not warm myself by the fire—I will become the flame."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Drain Life
oracle_text: Spend only black mana on X.

Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

name: Dwarven Ruins
oracle_text: Dwarven Ruins enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{T}, Sacrifice Dwarven Ruins: Add {R}{R}.

name: Ebon Stronghold
oracle_text: Ebon Stronghold enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{T}, Sacrifice Ebon Stronghold: Add {B}{B}.

name: Erhnam Djinn
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

name: Fallen Angel
oracle_text: Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Angels are simply extensions of truth upon the fabric of life—and there is far more dark than light." —Baron Sengir

name: Feral Shadow
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"The nightstalkers are such a minor power in Urborg. Their sad eagerness to elevate themselves makes them willing tools in the plundering of little Femeref."
—Kaervek

name: Fireball
oracle_text: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Fog Elemental
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"I've seen fog so thick you could cut it, but none that could cut me."
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

name: Force of Nature
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

name: Gaseous Form
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Giant Crab
oracle_text: {U}: Giant Crab gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: During the giant crabs' mating season, Skyshroud nights are filled with the clatter of their skirmishes.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

name: Havenwood Battleground
oracle_text: Havenwood Battleground enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{T}, Sacrifice Havenwood Battleground: Add {G}{G}.

name: Hollow Dogs
oracle_text: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

name: Hulking Cyclops
oracle_text: Hulking Cyclops can't block.
flavor_text: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

name: Impulse
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"Controlling time ensures you need never look impulsive again."
—Teferi

name: Killer Whale
oracle_text: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Hunger is like the sea: deep, endless, and unforgiving.

name: Kird Ape
oracle_text: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Catch!"

name: Leviathan
oracle_text: Trample
Leviathan enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan.
Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

name: Lightning Bolt
oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

name: Lowland Giant
flavor_text: "Faugh!" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

name: Mahamoti Djinn
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

name: Plated Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Most spiders wait patiently for their prey to arrive. Most spiders aren't forty feet tall.

name: Polluted Mire
oracle_text: Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.

oracle_text: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add {G}.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

name: Remote Isle
oracle_text: Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Scaled Wurm
flavor_text:
"Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."
—Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

name: Segmented Wurm
oracle_text: Whenever Segmented Wurm becomes the target of a spell or ability, put a -1/-1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"If only we could so easily leave behind those parts of ourselves that pain us."
—Crovax

name: Sengir Vampire
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

name: Shambling Strider
oracle_text: {R}{G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Freyalise forbid that any stranger should wander into the striders' territory.

name: Shivan Dragon
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: While it's true most dragons are cruel, the Shivan dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
Lightning tethers souls to the world.
—Kor saying

name: Skittering Horror

flavor_text:
"This monstrosity will do—for now."
—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.
flavor_text: The imps' warbling cries echo through Phyrexia's towers like those of mourning doves in a cathedral.

flavor_text:
"The cyclops shrugged off savage blows, but casual insults made him weep."
—Azeworai, "The Cyclops who Couldn't"

name: Terror
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

flavor_text:
"Most wizards consider a thunderbolt to be a proper retort."

name: Thundering Giant
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: The giant was felt a few seconds before he was seen.

name: Tolarian Winds
oracle_text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.
flavor_text: Afterward, Tolaria's winds were like the whispers of lost wizards, calling for life.

name: Viashino Warrior
flavor_text:
"When traveling the Great Desert avoid wearing the scales of lizards, for the Viashino rule the sands and look poorly on the skinning of their cousins."
—Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

flavor_text: Awake and awing in the blink of an eye.

"no home    no heart    no hope"
—Stronghold graffito

name: Woolly Spider

Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a spider without an appetite."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

name: Yavimaya Wurm
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: When the gorilla playfully grabbed the wurm's tail, the wurm doubled back and playfully ate the gorilla's head.
